attributes.name: Potential LSA Authentication Package Abuse v100.0.1
attributes.description: Adversaries can use the autostart mechanism provided by the Local Security Authority (LSA) authentication packages for privilege escalation or persistence by placing a reference to a binary in the Windows registry. The binary will then be executed by SYSTEM when the authentication packages are loaded.
author: Elastic
attributes.query:
registry where event.type == "change" and
  registry.path : "HKLM\\SYSTEM\\*ControlSet*\\Control\\Lsa\\Authentication Packages" and
  /* exclude SYSTEM SID - look for changes by non-SYSTEM user */
  not user.id : "S-1-5-18"
